name: MEC Skylight UPF Long Sleeve T-Shirt - Children
categories: Toddler and child t-shirts and tops
Toddler and child long sleeved t-shirts
description:
A welcome tag-along for your next beach day or summer camping trip. This long-sleeved sun shirt offers UPF 40 sun protection, letting kids play soccer or hop in and out of the water without compromising sun safety. Chafe-free seams and raglan sleeves mean the construction will feel comfortable while paddling or under backpack straps.Slim fit keeps material to a minimum, allowing complete freedom.Active odour control lets you go a couple extra days between washes.UPF 40 blocks more than 97% of UV, great for long days in the sun.bluesign® approved poly spandex blend dries fast, wicks moisture and feels cool against the skin.Name label on the inside helps make the games of ‘whose is whose’ a bit easier.Raglan sleeves and flatlock seams provide chafe-free comfort during wet or sweaty activities.

        Sustainability
